formdata.value: Learn Laravel from basics to advanced topics.
This course covers routing, Eloquent, Blade, queues, and more in Laravel 11.

formdata.description: if is_user_limit_enabled is true then min:1
if status is true then ['free', 'paid'] : free
if status is true then true/false
if status is true then in : 'course_completion', 'calendar'
if status is true then min:1
if status is true then : url
if status is true then : ['english', 'hindi', 'other'] : english
if status is true : List or description of prerequisites for the course
if status is true : Key benefits or learning outcomes of the course
if status is true : Duration of the course (e.g., 1hours 30min, etc.)
if status is true : Who this course is intended for
if status is true : Average course rating between 0.00 and 5.00
if status is true : Indicates if the course offers a money-back guarantee
if has_money_back_guarantee is true : Number of days covered under the money-back guarantee in days
if status is true : Indicates whether the course is live or recorded
if is_live is true :  Start date for live courses
if is_live is true : in : ['day', 'week', 'month', 'year', 'unlimited'] : Validity unit for live courses
if is_live is false : min:1 : Validity duration for recorded courses; NULL means unlimited
